statements: SELECT * FROM MarketingInsights WHERE id = 1;
SELECT department_name, data_insights FROM MarketingInsights WHERE department_name = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM MarketingInsights WHERE sharing_department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY sharing_date DESC;
SELECT id, department_name FROM MarketingInsights WHERE id > 3 AND id < 6;
SELECT department_name, sharing_department FROM MarketingInsights WHERE sharing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MarketingInsights ORDER BY sharing_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT department_name, data_insights FROM MarketingInsights WHERE department_name='Sales'
SELECT id, department_name, sharing_department FROM MarketingInsights WHERE sharing_department='Finance' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM MarketingInsights WHERE sharing_department='Marketing' AND department_name='Product'
SELECT data_insights FROM MarketingInsights WHERE sharing_department='HR' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM marketing_insights;
SELECT department_name, data_insight FROM marketing_insights ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT department_name, data_insight FROM marketing_insights WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM department_alignment WHERE align_strategy = 'Customer Engagement';
SELECT department_name, align_strategy FROM department_alignment ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_insights WHERE department_name = 'Sales'
SELECT id, department_name FROM marketing_insights ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM department_alignment WHERE department_name = 'Marketing'
SELECT data_insight FROM marketing_insights WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM marketing_insights JOIN department_alignment ON marketing_insights.department_name = department_alignment.department_name
SELECT * FROM MarketingData;
SELECT campaign_name, data_insights FROM MarketingData WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT id, department_name, department_head FROM Department WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM DataSharing WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT table_name, shared_insights FROM DataSharing;
SELECT * FROM MarketingData WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, data_insights FROM MarketingData WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Department JOIN DataSharing ON Department.id = DataSharing.department_id WHERE DataSharing.table_name = 'SalesInsights';
SELECT department_name, location FROM Department WHERE department_head = 'John Doe';
SELECT campaign_name, data_insights, department_name FROM MarketingData JOIN Department ON MarketingData.department_id = Department.id WHERE Department.location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM department;
SELECT employee_name, department_id FROM employee WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT insight_description, created_at FROM marketing_insights WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT alignment_description FROM strategy_alignment WHERE approved = TRUE;
SELECT MAX(insight_id) AS max_insight_id FROM marketing_insights;
SELECT * FROM department ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM employee JOIN department ON employee.department_id = department.department_id WHERE employee.manager_id IS NULL;

SELECT employee_name, insight_description, created_at FROM employee JOIN marketing_insights ON employee.employee_id = marketing_insights.employee_id WHERE employee.department_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at ASC;

SELECT employee_name, alignment_description, approved FROM employee JOIN marketing_insights ON employee.employee_id = marketing_insights.employee_id JOIN strategy_alignment ON marketing_insights.insight_id = strategy_alignment.insight_id WHERE strategy_alignment.approved = TRUE;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS num_employees FROM department LEFT JOIN employee ON department.department_id = employee.department_id GROUP BY department_name HAVING num_employees > 1;
SELECT * FROM department_data;
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM department_data WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT marketing_campaign, target_audience, budget FROM marketing_data ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT log_id, collaboration_date FROM collaboration_logs WHERE department_id = 2 ORDER BY collaboration_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, insights FROM department_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM department_data WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT department_name, data_insights FROM department_data WHERE department_id > 1 ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT department_name, data_insights FROM department_data WHERE department_id < 5 AND department_name LIKE '%sales%';
SELECT DISTINCT department_name FROM department_data WHERE data_insights IS NOT NULL;
SELECT department_id, department_name, data_insights FROM department_data WHERE department_id IN (2, 4) ORDER BY department_id ASC, department_name DESC;
